What@Teslahas built is remarkable. Texas is proud to have Elon in our state, creating thousands of jobs, making massive investments and building a brighter and more prosperous future for our world.

item.description: The UK establishment hate X more than any other platform because you can say what you think, write community notes to hold them accountable and embarrass/expose them for lying. They also hate Elon Musk. Thats why theyâ€™ve not gone after Google and ChatGPT.

item.title: @elonmusk: Artemis was never just about returning to the Moon, it was about staying, building, and unlocking lo...
item.description: Artemis was never just about returning to the Moon, it was about staying, building, and unlocking long term scientific, economic, and national security potential. Investing in infrastructure, nuclear power, and an orbital economy is how we accelerate discovery and set up the next giant leaps to Mars and beyond.

item.title: @elonmusk: Australian PM does not want to ban only fans where you can watch one woman screw a thousand guys to ...
item.description: Australian PM does not want to ban only fans where you can watch one woman screw a thousand guys to make money. He doesn't want to ban gambling ads that cause suicide and destruction Australia wide. But he wants to ban X because Grok pictured him in a bikini.
